text: The World According to Garp is 1982 American comedy drama movie directed by George Roy Hill, based on the novel of the same title by John Irving, who co- wrote the script with Steve Tesich. The movie starred Robin Williams, Glenn Close, and John Lithgow. ==Cast== * Robin Williams as T.S. Garp * James "J.B." McCall as young Garp * Mary Beth Hurt as Helen Holm * Glenn Close as Jenny Fields * John Lithgow as Roberta Muldoon * Hume Cronyn as Mr. Fields * Jessica Tandy as Mrs. Fields * Swoosie Kurtz as The Hooker * Peter Michael Goetz as John Wolf * Mark Soper as Michael Milton * Amanda Plummer as Ellen James ==Other websites== * * * Category:1982 comedy-drama movies Category:1982 LGBT movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by George Roy Hill Category:Movies about sex crimes
title: The World According to Garp (movie)
